word:
One Kind of Employment for Sabbathkeepers.--We find here the best class of people to work for. And for many of them it would not be difficult to keep the Sabbath. _____is a place where a great deal of poultry raising is done. With almost every dwelling house on the outskirts of the city poultry yards are connected. The houses are not built in terraces, but stand apart from one another, often surrounded by several acres of land. Poultry of all kinds is raised, 
                                                                           246
and the eggs find a ready market in _____ and _____, and are taken to the city by boat.
